Issue.creator: srottem
Issue.summary: Improve error reporting when closing agent listeners and connections with invalid handles
Issue.description: Currently calling the indy_agent_close_listener and indy_agent_close_connection functions with an invalid handle results in a CommonInvalidStructure error (113). Ideally these functions will return an 'InvalidHandle' type error in the same way as calling the indy_close_wallet function does (i.e.. WalletInvalidHandle (200)).
